actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, so as to provide a special pension program for veterans of World War I.
short_title: Act to Establish a Special Pension Program for World War I Veterans

summary.text: Act to Establish a Special Pension Program for World War I Veterans - Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to pay a monthly pension of $150 to eligible World War I veterans. Establishes maximum eligibility income ceilings for purposes of such pension.
